author: rgerosa
body:
This PR includes:

a) Implementation of selective upload of channels to the online DB.
b) Removing invalid channels from the pedestals upload.
c) Re-design the analysis which fits for the si-strip pulse shape parameters for both deco and peak mode.
d) Update an old analysis task (PedsFullNoise) to be used to identify single noisy/bad strips in the detector. The analysis requires a new analysisDescription object provided by the external tkonline-libs. They have been already merged in CMSDIST via:
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/3819
title: Si-strip commissioning workflow updates
